title.rendered: NowBoarding Launches Global Travel Marketplace, Revolutionizing Traveler and Supplier Connections with Real-Time Personalized Offers

content.rendered:
Commission-Free, No-Middle-Man Marketplace Connects Suppliers and Travelers Directly

NEW YORK, July 10, 2024 /PRNewswire/ — The ineluctable middlemen have long been the problem with the travel industry – too many layers and mouths to feed between suppliers and travelers. Some $75B a year in hotel commissions and short term rental booking fees are paid to the largest online travel retailers Airbnb, Expedia and Booking.com that inflate prices for consumers diminishing discretionary spending on travel. Adding to the problem is the strife between retailers and hosts with different motivations for implementation of rules, communication and ownership of the traveler pushing suppliers to look for alternatives.



Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/nowboarding-launches-global-travel-marketplace-revolutionizing-traveler-and-supplier-connections-with-real-time-personalized-offers-302192731.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com

Some $75B a year in hotel commissions and short term rental booking fees are paid to […]
